content.label: Seeing the footsteps of something chasing you is the worst. And hearing the sounds. All and all, a truly scary experience. Especially alone and in the dark!

title.label: Not what I expected (in a good way)

content.label: Holy heck, when I first saw this game on Chills I was like: “Lol this looks so boring, hahahaha” but when I actually played it I was like: “woah this game is so fun.”

Ok, this is a horror game, but it’s disappointingly not that scary, but who cares? This game is absolutely amazing. It uses a great mechanic, has great sound, and is very, VERY hard at times. Really, the only thing that’s scary is the enemies. They sometimes come out of nowhere and and that causes you to panic and accidentally run right into them. Also, the death sound effect. Holy crap, the death sound effect. It starts with a scream, then you hear bones cracking, blood spattering, and chunks of flesh falling to the ground. It’s delightful. Sarcasm intended.

I found this game to be a bit odd at first. Then was introduced with the enemy’s and traps and was intrigued by the game play then so on so forth with all the puzzle levels. This is my first game review and really am still enjoying to play now. Keep up the good work!!

title.label: Wish I could get a refund

content.label: It’s a good thing Apple is switching to a subscription service. They recommend games like this and it’s obvious in 30s it was a horrible mistake, but your money is completely wasted.  They don’t even show you what the “gameplay” is like.  At first I thought the “game” was buggy, and only later did it hit me it was just poorly designed.

title.label: Can’t believe I forgot to rate!!!

content.label: This game is amazing! I just can’t believe I forgot to read it years ago when I first tried it! I’ve never played anything like it & I play a lot of games! Its totally intense and scary at times & it will surely make you jump! Especially if you play with their headphones on in the dark!! Try it out you’ll be happy!!!!

The controls need work for one side to throw a rock the other to walk sometimes you walk when you try to throw a rock and it get you killed it shouldn’t be walk on all sides it makes it annoying to throw a rock
I've never had a mobile game that makes me jump like this one

Unsolvable floor due to poor adaptation  to Apple TV- you can’t throw rocks to distract the monster like on other platforms. When I knew I had solved it, but couldn’t do what was necessary, I checked a variety of video walkthroughs which verified the issue was Apple TV. I’ve written weeks ago to the company, and they’ve ignored my support request. 

Generally, before that glitch halted all progress, it was way too easy and a bore. Don’t waste your money.
It’s a pretty good game. The game mechanics are at times hard to remember but... pretty good.

I am a huge scaredy cat and can’t watch scary movies or anything because I end up crying, and this game is definitely really creepy and scary. But it is such a thrill playing this game. I was frightened but could not stop playing this game. I love that it makes you think, strategize, and keeps you on your toes. I have finished this game and still replay and replay! I love this!

As a developer myself my first thought when I saw this game featured was, “Those echo effects are soooo cool!” And after buying it I gotta say this is very well made. I never been a fan of scary movies nor especially games, but I love puzzles (Monument Valley is a fav) and avoiding red stuff you can’t see didn’t seem that scary. I have bought it now, love the price btw, and surprised myself that that aspect is actually a bit scary. I’m good and think this game is awesome! But if you really don’t like horror (I wasn’t exactly frightened just nervous- I’m very competitive) even if it doesn’t seem all that creepy— beware.
I love this game but sometimes it is laggy and glitchy.
Navigating is really difficult
I love this game but the problem is that it is way to short. I could finish this game in like an hour, and also it’s really easy so please fix these things and then it will be a five out five game

I really like this game. However, the human scream that sounds when you die is unnerving (annoying) enough that I can't play it. Just give it a good Pac man dying sound! If you can get past that, good stuff.
This game give a challenge at level about 20+ and is very fun to play it has great mechanics and great controls I all around love this game
Pretty hard but very fun 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
Meme

I do love this game.

However apparently there’s a bug on level “XXXII - Ambush”. 
When the level begins, all 6 monsters around me are already triggered, causing my instant death. 

I even tried to watch a walkthrough in YouTube, but in those videos the monsters are not triggered right when the level starts.

Perhaps that’s a bug, or maybe I just couldn’t figure it out yet. I’ll keep trying! haha

I cannot get the user to move, stomp, or throw. The monster simply gets me in the first couple seconds and there is nothing I can do. 

Fun game other than the bug
Great visuals and sounds, cool concept for a game I haven’t seen before

Ok, I love this game, but it’s sometimes glitchy and always annoying. I’m just salty because it’s hard, but seriously one time I threw a rock and lead all of the monsters into one corner, and when I lead all of the back, one of them teleported or something. There was still one there when they clearly all left. (I counted) It’s a great concept, but maybe a level maker would be cool. I understand if you can’t implement my ideas, but I just think it would make the game a little bit more interesting. I’m stuck on level XXXIII and it’s glitchy as heck. If it’s not the glitches, I’m just dumb but I seriously don’t know how to beat it. I looked up a walkthrough and still couldn’t beat it, so I might delete it. But anyway, it’s a good game that needs more features.
This game is utterly amazing!
Really love the design of this game! Playing it with headphones on is an awesome experience.

I didn’t have super high expectations for this app, but it’ll genuinely make you panic and jump sometimes. The devs really know how to play with atmosphere and humans’ inherent fear of the dark and unknown. Play with headphones on in a dark room for maximum immersion.
Best game I have played!!! Finished it before and now back to play again!!!! Wishing for a sequel 👍

title.label: A Horror Game That Leaves You Thinking

content.label:
Dark Echo is unlike any horror game I have ever witnessed. It isn't concluded by logic, it's formed by imagination and impulse. (Spoilers ahead in what I say next).

When you enter that final door, everything flashes white. You hear birds chirping around you. Your character slows to a halt, and then the game ends. It leaves you shaking down to the bone and in tears. 'What happened?' You may wonder. It's up to you to decide that. In my mind, I pictured the guy escaping. He slows down to a halt until suddenly collapsing down onto his knees, sobbing his heart out. 

Where was he? Who was he...? This was my theory until I reopened the app to see it continued in white and black now. In my head and possibly in his, I see the sounds of birds chirping as an illusion. Just before he gets slain by that nearby red monster, realization hits him in the face that it's just starting all over again. No matter what the poor guy does, he's always stuck in this never ending madness. 

In conclusion, I just want to say thank you. Thank you for creating such a brilliant and innovative game. I have a small complaint though. 

As of right now, the game will not stop CRASHING. I cannot even open the app. I really do not want to delete the app because I was 1 level away from completing the Light realm. At first it crashed when I decided to go replay the first two episodes of the dark realm, and now it refuses to let me open the game. I would really really appreciate if you tried to fix this for me. 

Maybe other people are having the same problem? I just want to finish the game..

--AFTER SEVERAL WEEKS--
The game continues to forcefully crash. I don't know why. The most horrific part is that I was on the last level and can't seem to even open it at all. It's really bad. I hope you somehow manage to fix this.

--AFTER SEVERAL MONTHS--
Got so hopeful that the game would work again due to recent updates, but it proceeded to crash. I’m not very obliged to the idea of deleting the app and reinstalling since I was one level away from completing the Light realm as you know. I constantly tap on the game just to see it would magically work, but it does not. Very disappointing. I really hope you get around to fixing this problem. Until then, I’ll keep on tapping the app each day in hopes that it’ll work. My condolences if I’m bothering you too much, I’m sure you’re very busy. I just hope you’ll get around to solving this problem now that you’re back to trying to tweak the game.
exceptional 🙌👏
Best game ever fun and challenging
Interesting game but i've been wandering the same level for weeks!!! Need more hints that I'm going the right way. Game is getting frustrating.
This app should set the bar for all other apps.
This game has great potential but unfriendly controls and clashing visuals make this game unenjoyable after the first few levels.
I love this game so much, the surround sound was epic!
Love this game so much! ^-^
HAPTIC FEEDBACK
Like
Great app, but it will be barred from the App Store soon.

I have bought this game for the nimbus steel series controller. I haven't had any issues sit it has been very fun, however there is a slight problem. With the nimbus controller I cannot walk quietly without touching the screen, there is no control on the nimbus that can walk quietly to escape fear. It would be trusty appreciated if you could fix this problem. Thank you.

This game looks amazing. Buy it. It is so worth it. I am so surprised it is this cheap. Great concept. Easy controls, great graphics, TERRYFYING in some levels. BUY THIS GAME. ITS WORTH IT. RAC7 I hope you make more games like this. Well done

Seriously this game is incredible. Great concept, great execution. It's a type of scary that isn't cheap or cliché. I just began playing tonight and already jumped. Keep in mind I probably haven't come near the end but my impressions so far are obviously outstanding because I never write reviews for apps. No seriously, for the past four years I've reviewed four apps at most. Get this game, give it a shot. Also no ads!! 10/10 would bang

The game is creative at most. The thought process into it is phenomenal. Whoever came up with this needs to get a raise. I will say the mechanic of throwing the rock is a bit odd but it's still very helpful. Keep up the good work.

title.label: It's an awesome game, really scary

content.label: It gives out tension and the sound track is terrifying. You're not able to see but hear your way out.
Simple and great. Love when games are so simple and so entertaining
There was so much tension and excitement in this game with the sounds and unexpected events. I loved it!

2 things.
1: I played this game for an hour, and in that time not once was I tense or scared. I do not know what is chasing me, usually I would come with an imaginative monster, but I just saw it as a computer program tasked with following the last place you made noise. Not scary

2: You are given no reason to care. With no backstory, no narration, no knowledge of where you are or why you're here, why should I care? I don't even know who I'm controlling! There is one word at the start of each level. Maybe it gets better as it goes on, I dunno.

This game is fun I've had it for 2years now and still play it, it plays well and fills my empty time with something to do it's worth the $1.99 you pay for it. This game also makes you wonder what chases you how to solve.

This game is awful. It's really fun but after like 5 levels it's boring. I mean if you like boring, repetitive, useless, confusing games...then this is for you. As for me, a complete waste of money. I recommend not getting this game EVER.👎🏻😠
Though this game has original and new gameplay, andI won't deny it's beauty, there's too much confusion. I got stuck on a level that I've been unable to solve. Hope this game can improve!
i had already got this game when it was free but i have to pay now
